scenes.description: Promotion for the 2nd round of concert merchandise for Mori Calliope's 2nd Concert 'Grimoire'.
A compilation of support messages and fan art from fans worldwide, celebrating the concert.
Standby screen announcing that the concert will be starting soon.
Notice for visitors regarding production effects and audience participation.
